name: The Given Path
description:
Karel.. you have to get me out of town, everyone is hunting me.

Keep the escort alive by drawing his path and ordering him when to move.
Be stealthy or fight, the combat is a card game inspired by Pokemon and Slay The Spire!

We had some problems with teammates not being able to participate the jam anymore but other then that the team worked really well together!

This is the 5th installment in the Kareliverse.
